title: Cheese Chase
description: A coop rythm game where you and your partner play as mice conducting a heist. The goal is to steal as much cheese from the bank as possible and bring it back to your van. Don't get caught by the police!

title: Monke
description: Engaging typing game to play by yourself or to compete between friends. Allows you to test your skills using a variety of settings and stats and have them be available for browsing to logged-in users. Includes a Multiplayer feature that allows you to compete with friends in real time.

title: PokeDaw
description: Mock mobile application of the Pokemon game. The game includes features such as PokeCenter, Battle, TeamSwap, PC, etc.

title: Robby The Robot
description: Adaptive learning genetic algorithm called Robby The Robot. Robby is meant to pick up coins on a grid, and only the best results are displayed. A console library provides an interface to start the algorithm work, evaluate Robby's intelligence/fitness, and output the results. A Monogame library is present with a GUI program that can visually display the results of the genetic algorithm's evolution of Robby the robot.

title: Piano Simulation
description: Project simulating a Piano, keyboard keys map to the piano keys and allow the user to play the piano, with sound and visual showing the keys being pressed.

title: Smart Home
description: Smart Home proof of concept. MQTT clients connecting to the HiveMQ broker running on the HiveMQ cloud to publish and subscribe to messages related to the setup sensors (Motion detector, Doorbell, DHT sensors, and Camera). A GUI gets launched upon completing valid information (login) to display sensor data to and from all users running the program.

title: Web Scraping and Data Science
description: Interactive application scraping Covid-19 data from the web and storing it in a database. The data is then analyzed and compilated into graphs. User can choose to compare different countries of his choice.
